BOUNTY SYSTEM

We understand that nothing is perfect, so we would like to get you all to help us to catch any bug there might be. It would be really great if you could send us any bug, exploit, information leak or whatever you find to our email address. Please encrypt the messages with our key. For the biggest exploits you'll be rewarded financially and optionally written to our Hall of Fame.

We value your effort and our strong security, so the offered bounties currently are:

Available BountiesBounty
Severe bug or combination of bugs leading to loosing any amount of bitcoins3 BTC
Severe bug or combination of bugs leading to revealing the identity of the washbit operator or any of the clients3 BTC
HALL of FAME
Currently Empty

HOW DOES IT WORK?

  • What is a pool?

    You can imagine a pool as a big bag of bitcoins, into which dirty coins flow and are mixed with others' coins. The pool's balance is many times bigger than an usual transaction involved. Washbit run several of these pools, each completely independent of the others. When you send your bitcoins to washbit, they are being forwarded to one of these pools. In a single washbit transaction, however, the bitcoin you receive are guaranteed to originate from a different pool. This way, there is no correlation between your old and new bitcoins.

  • How many bitcoins can I clean?

    Washbit has a substantial reserve of bitcoins to cover your volume laundering needs. There is more than 1000 BTC in the pools and the maximum recommended volume to wash is 200 BTC. You should enter at least 5 final addresses so this amount is reasonably split. The minimum amount to clean is 0.01 BTC.

  • What if I do more transactions?

    Since we don't track our users, we cannot know that it is you who made another transaction. This way, of course, it might happen that you get bitcoins from a pool to which you deposited earlier. But whoever might be tracking you, he won't know anything about these former transaction. Your old bitcoins were already mixed in the pool with bitcoins of other users and they are undistinguishable to other bitcoins. It is recommmended to read more about anonymity on bitcoin wiki page.

  • Aren't you going to keep my bitcoins?

    Technically, yes. But we will send you other, unrelated, fresh bitcoins instead. And we will keep some fee, for our service. Current fee is between 0.9% - 1%, randomized for more anonymity and the minimal deposit is currently 0.01 BTC. Washbit is a reputable service and we care about our users. You can find more information about us on our bitcointalk.org page. If you have any questions, you can also contact us by email.

  • Is washbit safe to use?

    We took extra care for our service to be as secure as possible. Our servers are hardened against remote and local attacks, but for obvious reasons, full details cannot be disclosed here. But experience shows us that no system is 100% secure, so if you find any security hole, please inform us on our email. We are currently paying a bounty for found exploits, please have a look at our dedicated bounty page for more details.

  • Do you keep logs? How can I be more anonymous?

    We do not keep any information that can be used to track our users. System logs are kept for some time to help us to make our service better, but they are periodically wiped so they cannot be misused in future. This site does not run any javascript and you are recommended to use our tor gateway, which is run at washbitcom2qv6wa.onion. Always make sure that you use this address to avoid any phishing sites!

  • Why does the address expire after 24 hours?

    The generated deposit addresses expire after 24 hours for anonymity reasons. When the address expires, the information about it is wiped from the system, so even if someone managed to gain an access to it, the information cannot be used to used to track our users, because it's simply not there. Also, you don't have to worry if you have an unconfirmed transaction and 24 hours are over - the system won't accept any new transaction, but it considers all transactions sent (not just confirmed) within 24 hours from the activation to be valid.

© 2015     https://washbit.org     washbitcom2qv6wa.onion
